https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/povsmGWu4m9qNWYj4ZKR4UwOxqu.jpg In 1932, Chaplin, in full midlife crisis, escapes to Bali in search of himself to find the artistic rejuvenation and inspiration to do his difficult transition to sound film. Chaplin in Bali
